entry.title: Welcome to Log4 Analytics Online Support
entry.content:
Welcome to join our DevOps community. We will share our knowlege about IT automation and data analysis for systems, applications, or even security.

  • This is a snapshot of slack search as follow; It’s so powerful so that we also can search all chats in history or find uploaded documents for recalls.

To Join Us

Please send us your email address if you want to join DevOpsTaiwan.slack.com, We need your email address to invite you. I hope devops shares theirs projects or experiences in this chat room. specially who use docker, chef, or any other tools, like logstash, splunk (or elasticsearch). kubernetes, monit, zabbix, Jenkins, and so on.

Welcome to Log4 Analytics Online Support was originally published by Ming-der Wang at Log4資料分析公司 on April 14, 2015.
